reviews.review_msg: Ena is one of my favorite professor at SFU. She is very kind and passionate about the classes she teaches. Moreover, she is not only dedicated to ensuring that you become successful in her class but throughout your writing in your academic career. Going to her office hours helped a lot as she'll clarify mistakes and errors in your writing.
Too into identity politics. Talks too much about one point. Lots of passion though.

Ena gives A LOT OF GREAT FEEDBACK and encourages you to ask any questions you have. She is really kind & helpful, and she gives clear grading criteria on assessments. If I could, I would take a course with her again. Overall, she can be your instructor, your counsellor, AND even your friend. Best prof I've met so far at SFU! Totes recommend! :)
Best FAL NA
She's very nice and very helpful

best prof , very down to earth , willing to explain anything you don't understand even if it has nothing to do with the material. one of those prof that would never make you feel stupid , truly cares about each and every student .
easier than eng12 but very helpful as well
Cathi is super duper helpful. She is always fun and excited when she is teaching. I loved all of her classes. Take a class with her!
Very easy marker, very easy GPA boost

Aisha is a very caring professor and spends a lot of time with students and ensuring that they are on the right path. The class isn't hard but you have to work. She is there to help you so do meet with her if you have difficulty. Grading is clear and she give good feedback.
Aisha is a great professor. She can be strict but that's a good thing as she ensures that you are on the right track. Super helpful and a wonderful person as well. Very caring.

Participation matters, so be prepared to talk in class. The ratings are unfair as the class is straightforward. You show up and do the In class assignments and it's an easy pass. I'm not sure what the other ratings are saying by not having a "clear grading criteria" as Aisha provides us with the requirements and criteria needed for each assignment.

Aisha is a great professor despite what the other ratings say. The lectures are straightforward and you can tell she has a passion for English when she teaches. She is also a caring person who likes to make occasional jokes. Her grading criteria is clear to understand. It is not hard to get a good grade if you take her comments into account.

This was the most useless class ever. Her grading scheme was very unclear, and doesn't even tell you what you can improve on. She will ramble on, and then she expects everyone in the class to answer her questions, even though it's the exact same answer worded differently.  Yeah, save yourself and do not take this class with her.

Course notes were fulfilled with nonsense, she always emphasize "cohesion and coherence" but she didn't provide useful information to strengthen these aspects.  And her advice was hardly useful when we takes in-class assignment. No significant advantage to choose this prof. Avoid this at all cost!
unclear grading scheme, avoid this at all cost!!
HER GRADING SCHEME WERE NOT CLEAR, MOST OF THE COURSE MATERIAL WAS NOT SO USEFUL, AND THIS COURSE IS LEAST USEFUL COURSE IN THIS UNIVERSITY.

not bad. I like her but not super like. she is a nice teacher. marking is somehow not really fair. i know some students who handed in essays late but got an A......anyway, overall is not bad :) recommended.
everyone will be satisfied at the end of the class!
as long as you do your homework, you'll get an A.It's totally a GPA booster course

Her criteria doesn't really correspond to what she teaches in class. She also marks excessively hard, especially for a FAL course. If you can take the class with another teacher it'll save you the hassle....
no matter how much work you did, she will give you a "fair" mark.

Just wanted to post here to let readers know that Marela has passed away in 2021, please dont take this page down. She was an amazing professor and the kind words of her students deserved to be recorded on the internet.

pls hole punch your hand outs thats all i ask!!! also she is a nice lady and all but as a teacher she is a lil awkward, always asking the class questions and no one wants to answer cuz we havent been taught yet/irrelevant questions.

Marela was great. I'm not sure what all the complaints are about, but ignore them - she is remarkably understanding and willing to help, but you have to ask for it and put in a healthy amount of effort. Seriously committed to  her job.
This is the worst prof I have ever had.  If you have a chance take that class with a different prof.  She doesn't help you with your assignments and then give you a bad grade.
The worst prof I have ever met. You will learn nothing in this courses because she will never help you and give you any valuable advice. You just end up with poor grades

The worst prof I have ever met. Whatever you ask, she just said you should figure out it by yourself. And you will never know what is wrong with your work, and just end up with poor grades. She is so mean and not helpful at all. I will never take her courses any more.
Took Falx99 in Spring 2011!  She was pretty easy in marking our assignments and was quite lenient in accepting late assignments.  If she were to teach another class, I would take it with her!

justt woooowww. where do i start?? this prof is amazinggg she makes everything interesting and useful. she is just great the best prof i have ever had in my life. she is so nice, funny and undrestanding
She's the nicest professor I have ever had. She kind helpful and not that strict! Take your fal with her and u will definitely get a good grade as long as you do your Writing
She is very helpful, nice, clear and generous with grades. If you want to take FAL, take it with her even if the class is early in the morning.
Really helpful and nice. As long as you do all the assignments and hand them in on time, you'll get a decent mark.
Very consistent with help of all students, and helpful with everyone amazing teacher and made the class sooo much better; really admirable professor, simply genius!
Best instructor I ever had! She is very nice and helpful.  She listen to comments and she put her best interest to students! She make me want to retake the course again!
No Comments
A fantastic prof who really cares about his students.
Coolest guy I know Would recommend 10/10 Beeve������
Coolest guy I know Would recommend 10/10

First week he was friendly and polite, then he started being rude to the class,constantly makes the atmosphere uncomfortable. He has strict rules of people being late and assignment deadlines, but he never handed back marked assignments on time. He give really short notices on canceling classes(often too). This teacher is a GPA dragger, stay away.
Arrogant, gives me least grade out of my courses, although i pay my full attention.  Egoistic

Naghmeh was very clear of her expectations from the start and taught me many useful tips to write a successful academic paper that I didn't know before. She is a very sweet professor who makes class interesting and worth to learn from. I enjoy the little exercises from the workbook and peer edit sessions.

First impression of her wasn't the greatest, but as the semester progressed she was very respectful and understanding. Although sometimes she was harsh on students, it was understandable. Loved taking the course with her as she provides detailed feedback. On the side note, she replies to email very often, but her TA aren't as active.
Very nice prof. However she does treat her students like little children and explain in way too much detail about very very simple tasks or concepts.

Jan is a helpful and supportive professor who gives great feedback on papers and assignments. She genuinely wants her students to succeed and will help you greatly improve your writing skills. I had to take FALX99 because I was 1% short of the minimum grade from gr.12 English and I am actually thankful I had to take it, super useful class/prof.

Jan is a very caring professor! Gives solid feedback and guides you to improve writing. Her presence creates a classroom atmosphere that emphasizes student discussion and communication with one another. Useful class to obtain and improve basic writing skills, and for making friends!
GREAT PROF!
Dr. MacLean is a great prof. Her lectures are helpful for future writing.

Dr. MacLean is an excellent  prof. She made sure all the students knew and understood what they were doing. I can tell that she really wanted her students to do well and she gave us positive feedback. She marked easily and pointed out the problems.
Really helpful professor

If you are aware sentence/essay structure, you will be OK as long as you paid the tuition fee. She is an easy marker but dont expect that you will at least learn something from this boring class/her.  It just kills your time.

She was great, really friendly and passionate about the subject matter.  Available for extra help, and very knowledgeable.  Doing the readings were important, also, high expectations for quality of language/ writing for papers, aware of cheating/ plagiarizing on essays.  Great course!
great prof
Always gone away even cancel the class, not very helpful to the writing but maybe easy to get grade
She is a pretty nice teacher. Only has few short essay, and has activities. Her evaluations are helpful, however, her APA style should improve. Beside, she will change the due date sometimes.
She is a nice teacher, she is willing to help u whenever is possible...easy presentation,,essays,,no much works to do...often joke around..not boring...shes just great...please take her course.

She is a great teacher her teaching is really helpful and after the assignments back, her comment what she wrote is useful, so I was easily got B+. the level of class is not really difficult for students. I'd like to say if u wanna make sure should get at least some basic skills before take her class
No Comments
She is a perfect professor! Her classes are interesting and she is very patient to help every student!
He is so funny.
really good professor.I like him so much

A prof that I'll miss a lot !!!! Nice, gentle, and always there to help! You can chat with him about others stuffs as well )and he likes to tell storie  I really hope that he teaches other English course as well
Great prof. He's clear with his marking criteria and he's always willing to help you out. He also tells you exactly what he's looking for in his assignments.
Excellent prof.
He is an awesome pro
excellent prof!!! very gentle!!! interesting class!!!easy to earn marks if you do all the assignment that he asked.
Her class was fun and I learned a lot about academic writing. She is pretty flexible and very enthusiastic. I enjoyed her class.
best teacher!~~
really a good profmy english has improved a lot!!

Katleen is an excellent teacher. She cares alot about her students. If you need help with anything, she'll be meet you whenever she is free. She gives lots of useful comments and feedback on assignments. A+++! :)
she is a good teacher. She cares a lot about her students. she also is a very sweet person!

he is such an amazing and sweet professor. also such a caring person as he understands our struggles and is always answer any emails instantly. if you ever have a hard time writing in general, take him for more interesting lectures and we also get to be more interactive during class.
Such an amazing and great professor. he knows how we feel and how we expeirence being a student and he will always assit you if you need any help
